html: VICTORY! Today, the U.S. Supreme Court REJECTED a challenge against New Jersey's ban on anti-#LGBTQ conversion therapy. The Court's decision to decline hearing the case means bans in 15 other states, D.C., and Puerto Rico will remain protected.pic.twitter.com/VbEha3yYyo
text:
VICTORY! Today, the U.S. Supreme Court REJECTED a challenge against New Jersey's ban on anti-#LGBTQ conversion therapy.

The Court's decision to decline hearing the case means bans in 15 other states, D.C., and Puerto Rico will remain protected.pic.twitter.com/VbEha3yYyo

                                      ... for the first time in EIGHT years.

text:

Hate, anti-Semitism & violence have no place in our country. We must take meaningful action to stop tragedies like this before they happen!

html: That's why today, @DonaldNorcross, @RepBonamici and I introduced the Women's Pension Protection Act. The bill improves spousal access to retirement plans, makes more long-term and part-time workers eligible for retirement plans, and improves financial literacy.
text: That's why today, @DonaldNorcross, @RepBonamici and I introduced the Women's Pension Protection Act. The bill improves spousal access to retirement plans, makes more long-term and part-time workers eligible for retirement plans, and improves financial literacy.

html: As we work to win full equality for women in America, we cannot overlook the retirement gap. Because they are much more likely to earn less than their male counterparts, women in America typically have far less money saved up for retirement.
text: As we work to win full equality for women in America, we cannot overlook the retirement gap. Because they are much more likely to earn less than their male counterparts, women in America typically have far less money saved up for retirement.

html: Do furloughed federal employees get back pay? That is up to the House, Senate & White House. In 2013, furloughed employees received back-pay through the enactment of legislation. ...I hope this information helps & that the #Trumpshutdown doesn’t last long. 11/11
text:
Do furloughed federal employees get back pay?

That is up to the House, Senate & White House. In 2013, furloughed employees received back-pay through the enactment of legislation.

...I hope this information helps & that the #Trumpshutdown doesn’t last long.

11/11

html: What is the impact on food safety activities? The FDA is unable to support the majority of its food safety activities. 10/11
text:
What is the impact on food safety activities?

The FDA is unable to support the majority of its food safety activities. 
10/11

html: What is the impact on medical research & the CDC? NIH shuts down most medical research & the CDC has to stop flu season monitoring, as well as treatment & prevention recommendations. 9/11
text:
What is the impact on medical research & the CDC?

NIH shuts down most medical research & the CDC has to stop flu season monitoring, as well as treatment & prevention recommendations. 
9/11

html: What is the impact on federal housing loans? The Federal Housing Administration stops approving applications for housing loans. 8/11
text:
What is the impact on federal housing loans?

The Federal Housing Administration stops approving applications for housing loans. 
8/11

html: What is the impact on small businesses? The shutdown halts federal loans to small businesses. 7/11
text:
What is the impact on small businesses?

The shutdown halts federal loans to small businesses.
7/11

html: What is the impact on US military personnel? The Defense Department says, “Military personnel on active duty, including reserve component personnel on federal active duty, will continue to report for duty and carry out assigned duties.” 6/11
text:
What is the impact on US military personnel?

The Defense Department says, “Military personnel on active duty, including reserve component personnel on federal active duty, will continue to report for duty and carry out assigned duties.” 
6/11

html: What is the impact on veterans’ services? All VA medical facilities & clinics remain fully operational. However, VA call centers & Veterans Benefits Admin public contact services are not available. 5/11
text:
What is the impact on veterans’ services?

All VA medical facilities & clinics remain fully operational. However, VA call centers & Veterans Benefits Admin public contact services are not available.
5/11

html: Will I still be able to visit the national parks and monuments? During the 2013 shutdown, national parks, monuments & Smithsonian museums were closed. The Trump Admin said it will work to keep national parks “as accessible as possible.” 4/11
text:
Will I still be able to visit the national parks and monuments?

During the 2013 shutdown, national parks, monuments & Smithsonian museums were closed. The Trump Admin said it will work to keep national parks “as accessible as possible.”
4/11

html: Will my mail still arrive? Yes. The ~500,000 Postal Service employees are exempt from a furlough because the Postal Service is self-funded. 3/11
text:
Will my mail still arrive?

Yes. The ~500,000 Postal Service employees are exempt from a furlough because the Postal Service is self-funded.
3/11

html: Will I continue to receive my Social Security & SSI checks? Yes. You’ll continue to receive Social Security & SSI checks. However, new Social Security cards will not be issued. 2/11
text:
Will I continue to receive my Social Security & SSI checks?

Yes. You’ll continue to receive Social Security & SSI checks. However, new Social Security cards will not be issued.
2/11
